text: Manuel Amado Tavares (born 20 December 1974), commonly known as Tavarinho, is a São Toméan footballer who plays as a defender for UD Rei Amador and the São Tomé and Príncipe national team. ==International career== Tavarinho made his international debut for São Tomé and Príncipe on 13 June 2015. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Association football defenders Category:São Tomé and Príncipe footballers Category:São Tomé and Príncipe international footballers Category:UDRA players
title: Tavarinho
